text:
Hi,
I'm Fabian doing a PhD on forest soil hydrology at WSL/ETHZ in Switzerland. Using data from long term monitoring plots and additionally stable isotopes I will use Bayesian parameter estimation of porous flow and transport model parameters in <https://github.com/fabern/LWFBrook90.jl|LWFBrook.jl>.

text: It has been added by <@U677NAWV8> last year, so he might know.

elements.text: last year, so he might know.

text: <@U01LLRB4VQE> you might want to look through Yujies packages <https://github.com/Yujie-W> (theyre for CLIMA land) the modularity is really impressive, and something we can move towards in julia as opposed to the closed dframeworks you see in Fortran/C++. I used to be involved in these things a little more (see <https://github.com/rafaqz/Photosynthesis.jl> - a partial rewrite of MAESPA) but I do mostly spatial models these days.
